itran, ma mebruzzâen

èôan ayen txeddmem

D ass ideg yiwen ur izmir ad ifukk yiwen, s wacemma. Assen, lameô i Öebbi
Imed$al, a nnegr nnsen

cmaâ ines d lmesk, f ayagi ad mêizwiren wid ippemêizwiren
